numlitem.para: Associated valve is secured closed, and
Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE is selected to either LOW or HIGH.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Con air Flow Rate selector "MAIN DECK S/O VLV INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Secure the associated Main Deck Shutoff Valve (M/D SOV) in the closed position by accessing the affected M/D SOV located under the main deck floor panels forward of wing gear wheel well in the mix bay:
Remove cargo-handling hardware, as required, to access the applicable floor panels.
Remove floor panels that are over affected M/D SOV at the following locations:
Open the P7 panel MN/DK FIRE SOV CONT circuit breaker.
Open the following P414 panel circuit breaker for the failed valve:
For M/D SOV 1, open the MN DK FIRE AIR COND SOV – 1 circuit breaker.
For M/D SOV 2, open the MN DK FIRE AIR COND SOV – 2 circuit breaker.
For M/D SOV 3, open the MN DK FIRE AIR COND SOV – 3 circuit breaker.
For M/D SOV 4, open the MN DK FIRE AIR COND SOV – 4 circuit breaker.
For M/D SOV 5, open the MN DK FIRE AIR COND SOV – 5 circuit breaker.
Disconnect, cap, and stow the electrical connector from the affected valve.
Manually position the valve override handle in the closed position.
Reinstall previously removed cargo handling hardware.
Close the P7 panel MN/DK FIRE SOV CONT circuit breaker (step C) and the circuit breaker opened in step D above.
Position the Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) LOWER LOBE CARGO CON AIR FLOW RATE selector to either LOW or HIGH.
